item.title: A trick to fix Hugo Mathjax bugs: \$\{\}\$ display error
item.description: Brief Bug Description See the output of following text: 1 2 3 4 5 We know $\mathcal{A}= \{a_1,a_2,a_3\}$ is a set. $$ \mathcal{A}= \{a_1,a_2,a_3\} $$ Output (\{\} is not recognized!): We know \(\mathcal{A}= \{a_1,a_2,a_3\}\) is a set. \[\mathcal{A}= \{a_1,a_2,a_3\} \] How to get the desired output? Simply to use <div></div> to render the markdown as html! 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 <div style ="display: inline;">We know $\mathcal{A}= \{a_1,a_2,a_3\}$ is a set.
